summary: Society-girl thrill seeker Lydia causes the death of motorcycle policeman and is prosecuted by her fianc√© Daniel who describes in lurid detail the downfall of Rome. While she's in prison she reforms and Daniel becomes a wasted alcoholic.

title: El homicida
